mapper.select: select memberID, count(planTitle) as numOfPlans, sum(days) as totalDays, CAST(avg(days) AS signed integer) as avgDays, min(days) as minPlanDays, max(days) as maxPlanDays from (select tripster.tbl_Member.Member_ID as memberID, tripster.tbl_Plan.Plan_Title as planTitle, TO_DAYS(Plan_EndDate)-to_days(Plan_StartDate) as days from tripster.tbl_Member join tripster.tbl_Plan on tripster.tbl_Member.Member_ID = tripster.tbl_Plan.Member_ID where tripster.tbl_Member.Member_ID = #{memberID} group by tripster.tbl_Plan.Plan_ID ) newTbl group by newTbl.memberID

#특정한 유저의 플랜만 뽑아서 그 플랜을 좋아요 누른 사람들의 수를 뽑아낸다. select UsersPlans.Plan_ID as plan_id, Plan_Title as plan_title, count(UsersPlans.Plan_ID) as num from tripster.tbl_Like join (select Plan_ID, Plan_Title from tripster.tbl_Plan where tripster.tbl_Plan.Member_ID = #{memberID})UsersPlans on tripster.tbl_Like.Plan_ID = UsersPlans.Plan_ID group by UsersPlans.Plan_ID
